data.message: Hi Marshall,I know it will be very difficult you can read this,plus give it a try...I mean,we your fans love you so much,and you know it,made some crazy things,just to be able to show that we love you truly,you have fans who world do anything for you,fans who world trade 365 days for 2 hours of your show,fans who travel all over the world wanting to follow you,you have idea how crazy it is,how it is ironic. We were against the world for you,because you are part of us,you a part of our life,and we are part of her. The desire to meet you  is huge,you have no idea how it hurts to be a fan,stay in love without being matched, begging to stay for HI,and live unanswered. I want you to know that we love you very much and fuck the opinion of unnecessary people,we love you and that is what matters. I love you so much,just love you. <3 <3 Kisses.... #stanforever
